content:
Craft an item of type: yellow_bed
inventory=[{"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a yellow bed, I need to make yellow dye using a dandelion. I have one dandelion in slot 38 so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: yellow_bed
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the yellow dye so I will move it to an empty slot in my inventory (eg., 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: yellow_bed
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft a yellow bed. A yellow bed requires placing 1 yellow dye and 1 white bed side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the yellow dye from slot 11 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: yellow_bed
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the yellow dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the white bed to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white bed to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: yellow_bed
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the yellow bed by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
